subject: Hockey, Ice
Apologies
lead_paragraph: After “Hockey Night in Canada’s” Don Cherry apologized for criticizing their views on fighting, the former enforcers Stu Grimson, Chris Nilan and Jim Thomson said they would not sue.
snippet: After “Hockey Night in Canada’s” Don Cherry apologized for criticizing their views on fighting, the former enforcers Stu Grimson, Chris Nilan and Jim Thomson said they would not sue.
